prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What are Stefan and Suzanne doing for Valentine's Day (today)?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical listing of the chart data using traditional horary principles, broken into its key elements for later reference in interpretation:

1. Planetary Positions (with degree, sign, and notable conditions):
 • Sun: 26°24′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 22°21′ Virgo
 • Mercury: 0°38′ Pisces
 • Venus: 6°40′ Aries
 • Mars: 17°33′ Cancer (Retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11°27′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 18°59′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°21′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°23′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°29′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 29°07′ Pisces (Retrograde)
 • Chiron: 19°59′ Aries
 • Ascendant: 28°32′ Cancer
 • Midheaven (MC): 11°39′ Aries
 • Imum Coeli (IC): 11°39′ Libra

2. Major Aspects (with orb details):
 • Jupiter sextile MC (orb: 0°)
 • MC opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune trine Ascendant (orb: 0°)
 • Jupiter trine IC (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 1°)
 • North Node trine Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 1°)
 • Moon trine Uranus (orb: 1°)
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Sun square Uranus (orb: 3°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 4°)
 • Pluto opposition Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Moon opposition Saturn (orb: 4°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Ascendant (orb: 5°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Venus sextile Jupiter (orb: 5°)
 • Moon sextile Mars (orb: 5°)
 • Venus opposition IC (orb: 5°)
 • Venus conjunction MC (orb: 5°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Moon sextile Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Mars square IC (orb: 6°)
 • Mars square MC (orb: 6°)
 • Moon opposition Neptune (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 7°)
 • Mercury square Uranus (orb: 7°)
 • Chiron opposition IC (orb: 8°)
 • Chiron conjunction MC (orb: 8°)
 • Venus conjunction Neptune (orb: 8°)
 • Venus trine Ascendant (orb: 8°)

3. Recognized Patterns:
 • Stellium: Involving Chiron (19° Aries), MC (11° Aries), Venus (6° Aries), Neptune (28° Pisces), and North Node (29° Pisces)
 • T‑Square: Formed by MC (11° Aries), Mars (17° Cancer), IC (11° Libra), and Chiron (19° Aries)
 • Cradle Pattern(s): Multiple occurrences involving the Moon (22° Virgo) with Neptune (28° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus), Ascendant (28° Cancer), Saturn (18° Pisces), and Mars (17° Cancer)

4. Special Features and Conditions:
 • Moon phase: Waning Gibbous
 • Dominant mode: Cardinal (among the inner planets)
 • Quadrant emphasis: Most planets lie in the top right quadrant; bottom right quadrant is empty
 • Motion indicators: Mars is rising while Pluto is descending
 • Significant placements: Venus and Chiron are on the Midheaven (MC) and the IC (Nadir) is at 11°39′ Libra
 • Aspect frequency: Sextile appears most often (10 times); Ascendant involved in 10 aspects
 • Dispositor note: Neptune in Pisces acts as the sole dispositor

5. House Placements and Their Implications for the Query:
 • Ascendant (28° Cancer): Represents the querent (Melissa Gale)
 • 9th House: Begins at 12° Pisces and contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node. This house represents Stefan (as per cross-reference indicating Stefan is symbolized by the Ascendant’s 9th house or that equivalent house position for foreign/other connections)
 • Additional houses:
  – 1st House (28° Cancer): Further supports self-representation
  – 7th House (28° Capricorn, containing Pluto) and 10th House (11° Aries, containing Chiron) offer context on partnerships and career/figures of authority respectively

6. Horary Chart Context for the Inquiry:
 • Question: “What are Stefan and Suzanne doing for Valentine’s Day (today)?”
 • Time & Place: Valentine's Day, Feb. 14, 2025, at 3:37 PM in South Lyon, Michigan, USA
 • Task for Analysis: Evaluate relevant indicators such as the sign and condition of the 9th House (for Stefan), the condition of the Ascendant (for Melissa as the querent), and apply horary principles by examining planetary aspects, dignities, and timing indicators relevant to the query.

This structured data set—planetary positions, aspects, recognizable patterns, special conditions, and house placements—constitutes the full set of chart data to work within a horary framework for the inquiry regarding Stefan and Suzanne’s plans for Valentine’s Day.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
adjusts my shawl and peers intently at the chart

My dear, the celestial alignments paint quite an,  interesting picture regarding Stefan and Suzanne's Valentine's Day activities. traces fingers along the chart

The most striking feature is Venus conjunct the Midheaven in Aries, with Chiron nearby. This suggests they are indeed engaging in romantic activities, but there's an element of,  shall we say, healing or working through something. The placement in Aries indicates passion and initiative.

Mars retrograde in Cancer in the 12th house, forming that T-square with the MC/IC axis and Chiron, tells me they're likely at home, but there's some hidden tension or secret desires at play. The retrograde motion suggests revisiting or reviewing something from the past.

leans forward, speaking in hushed tones

My dear, I must be frank - the chart shows they are likely engaging in intimate relations, but there's something,  unorthodox about it. Neptune conjunct the North Node in Pisces in the 9th house (representing Stefan) suggests fantasy, illusion, or perhaps even some form of role-play or escapism.

The Moon in Virgo opposing Saturn and Neptune indicates some emotional restriction or boundary being tested. Someone may be holding back or trying to maintain control.

pauses thoughtfully

Would you like me to delve deeper into the specific,  nature of their activities? The chart is quite explicit about certain details.

The Moon in Virgo opposing Saturn and Neptune indicates some emotional restriction or boundary being tested. Someone may be holding back or trying to maintain control.

pauses thoughtfully

Would you like me to delve deeper into the specific,  nature of their activities? The chart is quite explicit about certain details.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Yes, Madame, I would. However, I would also ask that you remain true to what the chart shows. I would prefer accuracy rather than anything else.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the horary chart, the following indications emerge:

• The 9th House—Stefan’s domain—shows a concentration of energies from Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node. Venus points to romance and pleasure; Neptune suggests a dreamy, ethereal quality to the affair; Saturn adds an element of structure or duty; and the North Node hints at fated or destined undertones. Stefan’s Valentine’s Day plan appears to be colored by an intention for an experience that is simultaneously romantic, artistically inspired, and bound by practical considerations.

• The Ascendant in Cancer, representing your perspective, emphasizes sensitivity and nurturing concerns. The overall chart’s cardinal energy suggests that both parties are taking initiative. However, tensions are evident in the T-square involving the Midheaven, Mars, and the Imum Coeli—indicating that while passion is in the air (supported by Venus and the Moon’s aspects), there are also underlying conflicts between personal desires and domestic or family responsibilities.

• The Moon in Virgo in the 3rd House, making a favorable trine to Uranus, indicates an element of spontaneity and communicative flair. There is a suggestion that lighthearted or unexpected elements might be woven into their plans—perhaps a surprise twist during the evening or a creative touch to an otherwise conventional celebration.

• The presence of Pluto in the 7th House (coupling with partnerships) introduces an element of intensity and transformation in how the relationship is expressed. Suzanne’s role may be marked by a desire to channel deep, perhaps even transformative energies into ensuring the day holds meaningful resonance.

• The multiple sextile aspects—especially those involving Jupiter, Neptune, and the Ascendant—indicate that despite some inner tensions (evidenced by Mars squares), there is a general flow towards harmonious expression. The interplay between dreamy ideals and practical measures suggests that plans for the day are designed to be both inspirational and managed with care.

Drawing these energies together, the chart indicates that Stefan and Suzanne are setting up an intimate, slightly unconventional Valentine’s Day celebration. Stefan is likely orchestrating an experience that touches on international or esoteric themes (reflecting the 9th House’s foreign and fated flavor), such as a gourmet or artfully inspired dinner at a venue that carries an unusual, almost ritualistic ambience. Simultaneously, Suzanne appears to be reinforcing the event with practical and transformative touches, ensuring that the celebration is both heartfelt and thoughtfully organized.

In summary, the chart points to a planned evening where romance meets creativity and intention—a celebration that is as much about soulful connection as it is about catering to established duties and family structures.
